items.headline: Activist Elliott wants PepsiCo to emulate Coke’s playbook. This is why.
items.summary_en: Activist Elliott Investment Management has amassed a $4 billion stake in PepsiCo and wants the consumer-goods giant to take a leaf out of Coca-Cola’s book.
